section_text: 1 1 The denominations of money in the currency of the United Kingdom shall be the pound sterling and the penny or new penny, being one hundredth part of a pound sterling. 2 Section 1(1) of the  Decimal Currency Act 1967 (which is superseded by subsection (1) above) is hereby repealed.
2 This Act may be cited as the Currency Act 1982.
